page.title: 11HEALTH AND ACCIDENTS cont.
page.content: There are no doctors, dentists, or a Health Centre, but there is a very good ambulance service, and they are very quick and efficient.{ {HOME LIFE Most people get up by 7 a.m. and have finished breakfast by 8 a.m. in order to get to school or work at 9 a.m. Lunch is mainly eaten between 12 a.m. and 2 p.m. The majority have a snack, but some make it their main meal. Tea is served at any time between 5 p.m. and 8 p.m. depending on what time the family gets home according to their activities so some families do not eat together. Supper is just a cup of cocoa or coffee and a biscuit. Supper is not so popular these days. { }
